overview: The Seven Deadly Sins are greed, gluttony, lust, envy, sloth, wrath and pride. Rita Faltoyano, Cassie Young, Trina Michaels, Angel Dark, Lexxi Tyler, Carmella Bing, Tony James, Carly Parker, Audrey Bitoni, Nataly D'angelo, Ian Tate, Antonia Deona, Kat Lee, Paul Chaplin, Pascal White and Carly Parker show you just what it is like to sin in a very sexy way, and Bluebird Films was there to capture it all on film.
title: Seven Deadly Sins
